Package com.microsoft.azure.v3.credentials

Class AzureCliCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.v3.credentials.AzureTokenCredentials
      • com.microsoft.azure.v3.credentials.AzureCliCredentials
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncServiceClientCredentials
    @Beta
public final class AzureCliCredentials
extends AzureTokenCredentials
    Token based credentials for use with a REST Service Client.
